1025230.name: Minda
1025230.description:
Minda is an online version of Abalone, the board game.

In Minda, not only you can play with the standard rule, but also you can play with customized rules like 3 seconds turn timeout, one marble life or both.

Minda has an unique discord bot that supports various features related to Minda such as history view. This will make you easier to boast about your intelligence in your discord community.

The best feature of Minda is the marble skin. Upload any image you like and make it into a marble skin. It will be shown to other players.

For more information such as explanation of how to use the discord bot, go to the following thread.
